name: Queen of the Mound
description:
Queen of the Mound is a rogue-like inspired by the likes of the Binding of Isaac and Hades. You must make your way through the mound to reclaim your throne from the dreaded Spiders. You can either fight through several rooms of relentless enemies, or you can try to recover the Sacred Bugs of Light in order to do so. To help you on your journey,  be sure to visit the Summoning Mounds for some helpful ancient bug powers!

This game was made by 4 designers, with assistance from 2 artists for the assets. We worked hard on it for our end of program capstone project and just want to share it with people. Please leave comments and tell us what you think! Thank you!
